countries.name: Sagrada Família,Barcelona
countries.description: The Sagrada Família is Antoni Gaudí's best-known work and has become an undisputed symbol of Barcelona.

countries.name: Banana Beach, Thailand
countries.description: Banana Beach in Phuket is a secluded and picturesque beach known for its crystal-clear waters, white sand, and tranquil atmosphere.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: The world's largest religious monument, a stunning example of Khmer architecture.

temples.name: Golden Temple, India
temples.description: Golden Temple, India. The Golden Temple, also known as Harmandir Sahib, stands as one of the most unique temples in the world.

beaches.name: Elafonissi Beach,Greece)
beaches.description: Tnown for its pink sand and crystal-clear turquoise waters, making it a popular destination.

beaches.name: Kaanapali Beach, USA
beaches.description: Known for its soft white sand, warm water, and a boardwalk for resort hopping.
